headline: Newmont Completes the Sale of Musselwhite, Éléonore, and CC&V
summary: DENVER, March 03, 2025--Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) ("Newmont" or the "Company") announced today that it has completed the previously disclosed sales of three non-core operations, including the Musselwhite and Éléonore operations in Canada and the Cripple Creek & Victor ("CC&V") operation in Colorado, USA.
